meaningMnemonic: You get <radical>tooth</radical> <radical>orders</radical>. You get these tooth orders various times in your life, depending on your <kanji>age</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Gaining and losing teeth aren't the only things dependent on <kanji>age</kanji>. There is also an age in which you get your first <reading>ray</reading> (れい) gun.
